title: 3-year-old boy in Campbell County accidentally shot himself after finding gun
content:
CAMPBELL CO., Va. (WDBJ7) A 3-year-old boy in Campbell County accidentally shot himself after finding a gunTuesday afternoon according to the Campbell County Sheriff's Office.
The boy and his father were in the car driving to a trash transfer site on Marysville Road. As the boy's father was emptying trash, the child found a gun in the vehicle and shot himself in the midsection.
The child didn't hit any major organs, Maj. L.T. Guthrie said. The child was taken to the hospital by helicopter.
